Latest updates

Roma Nebo presented a new song

Roma Nebo presented a new song "Oore", which became the main soundtrack to the series "My favorite Strashko". The new composition continues the story and theme of the song "Beautiful with a heart", dedicated to the fight against bullying and hatred on social networks.
